text: Chaman railway station (; ) is located in Chaman city, Killa Abdullah District, in the northern part of the Balochistan province of Pakistan. It lies on the border with the Kandahar Province of Afghanistan. The station serves as the terminus of the Rohri-Chaman Railway Line. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Killa Abdullah District Category:Railway stations on Rohri–Chaman Railway Line
title: Chaman railway station
